phrases: Far beyond the deep blue Earth, you and I shall meet...
A snow-white feather will come fluttering down, swaying gently in the air.
Without holding back, I want to envelope you, my one and only love.
I know I have the power to protect the one I love, right here in my hands.
Just as I have always dreamed.
Let the wind carry off your hopes, faraway.
I have wings nobody can see.
They will take us to where we can be free.
Hey, let me help you, Big Sister!
I call him Mitaro, the All-Purpose Slicer Dicer!
Now your workload will be so much lighter!
Skuld's been latching herself onto Belldandy for the past few days...
She was separated from her beloved sister.
You cannot blame her for wanting a tt ention.
I will bet deep down inside you are jealous!
You should let her mother you once in a while, too.
You are not going out somewhere, are you?
Yes, I am going to class with Keiichi.
All right, we will see you later!
All right, we will see you later!
You stay at home like a good little girl, now.
Big Sister, are you going to that place you call'college' again today?
There are so many people there at college...it is a lovely place to be.
I would not go there for anything!
Big Sister always goes off with Keiichi because of this thing!
I cannot believe he is making my beautiful Big Sister ride this piece of junk!
What is up with this inefficient fuel pump?
Oh my gosh, now that I can see... there is no oil cooler!
Well, if it is not Megumi!
That bike you fixed for me the other day...it is running like a dream!
It is my way of saying thanks.
You are always such a big help, Megumi.
The boss at the fish shop wants you to take a look at his bike, too.
It is so early in the morning...
I just thought I would join you guys for breakfast!
The grocer gave it to me.
You really do get around, do not you?
Can I join you for breakfast?
Can I join you for breakfast?
To think that I made all these modifications in such a short time...
What did you do to my bike?...
I must be a genius after all!
Oh, do not thank me, it was a piece of cake...
I forgot I was going to take it apart...
That is Belldandy's little sister, Skuld.
Do not treat me like a kid!
I may not look it, but...
So you attached a turbo, huh?
I may not look it, but...
I may not look it, but...
A turbo in front of the carburetor...
Hey, I am talking to you!
A turbo in front of the carburetor...
I bet you had a hard time keeping the carb balanced on both sides, right?
It would be a no-brainer with something simple like a car.
Oh, but you could always go with a fuel injector, right?
But then there would be the problem of heat...
You did great, making a turbo this small.
You did great, making a turbo this small.
But unfortunately, now the body's off-balance.
According to my calculations, it should be 1.5 times faster than before!
Sure, it is probably gotten a speed boost, but...
Get on and prove me right!
Get on and prove me right!
That will give you a better idea.
I do not care if you are his sister... you are not getting away with this!
This is for whoever dares to mock my inventions...
Those who use such violent words end up with violence in their hearts also.
If you are going to compete, it must be on equal footing.
You three must be sisters after all...
You three must be sisters after all...
What are you two doing here?
Den-chan missed you since you have been such a stranger these days, Morisato.
You keep your mouth shut about that!
Come on, you are too old to be so shy!
Um...so what is it that you have got?
These two will each build a robot, and compete against each other.
I do not think that is what he means.
Who said you could look into my mind?
What is it going to be?
Will you accept this challenge or not?
I think I will give it a shot.
Well, building a robot sounds like fun!
I will take you on, show you my power, and rub it in your face!
I will be looking forward to that.
You are treating me like a kid again!
I am going to build the most awesome robot and cut you down to size!
You can leave the rest to us!
Anything can happen with those two, huh?
Basically, it is a barrel-collecting race.
The robot that gathers the most steel drums inside that ring wins the game.
It is so like those two to come up with something like this.
You can use whatever materials you want, and any number of people.
And it looks like you will be allowed to use equipment and facilities at school.
Those are my kind of rules!
I am going to start designing my robot right away!
I think it will be a good experience for Skuld.
I would not be so sure...
I do understand the reason why you fired up Skuld like that, but...
Now then, I think I will go explain the rules to our little Skuld!
We are here to put our lives on the line to support Skuld!
We are the Megumi Morisato Fan Club Community!
And together we are going to guide Megumi to victory!
My, you two are both so popular.
Well, this is all pretty crazy, but let us both do our best, okay?
No way am I ever going to lose to you!
Telling us we can use any materials we want, and this is what they provide?
Humans are just too uncivilized to be true!
I am in the Megumi camp.
So you are with the enemy?
Since when did you go for that type?
Who knows what they are thinking...
Since when did you go for that type?
We are all rooting for you!
Are those the parts for your robot?
Want us to help you carry them?
Boy, they gave me such a shock!
That is it, you can just bring that here... this way.
Use that pipe for reinforcement, okay?
Use that pipe for reinforcement, okay?
So she cannot even build a robot by herself!
If that is the case, it should be a cakewalk for me!
Thanks, that is just what I needed.
Hey, what are you doing here?
I came to help out my darling little sister, of course!
I will be just fine on my own!
Is not there anything we can do to help you?
It is a lot of work for just one person.
I can build a robot on my own just fine!
I am not like that Megumi!
She is late coming back, do not you think?
I am sure she is wallowing in the joy of creation.
I am going to go help after all...
I am going to go help after all...
Is not that why you encouraged her?
If you go to her now, she will only be more stubborn about it.
Hey, so you are actually worried too, Urd!
That kid does not even look up to me as her older sister.
Alrighty, I am going to take a bath.
Do you think I was mistaken?
Skuld can be a little obstinate at times, but I think...
So that is why she is had such a chip on her shoulder...
But there is also an aspect of herself that differs from Megumi.
That is what I wanted her to find it on her own...
So you tried to make them compete.
Yes, because I was sure that those two could become friends, but...
I mean, she is your sister and Urd's, right?
Still, we cannot just leave her to fend for herself like this...
I have made a lot of headway tonight!
So what do you think, Big Sis...
I am going to call it a day!
Do not tell me it is a spy?
It makes me happy to hear you say that!
But is it really okay to treat us all like this?
All of us in the Nekomi Shopping Arcade are rooting for you, Megumi!
Come on, everyone, dig in and do your best for her!
I do not care if she sees what we have got!
Hey, why do not you come eat with us?
I guess she really cannot stand me.
I hear she is building her robot all by herself.
Well, I would not know, but...
But the thing is, there are limits to what you can accomplish on your own.
I am going to win no matter what!
The Robot Battle between Skuld and Megumi Morisato will now begin!
With Skuld wielding the controls... a machine called Hysteric Wheel 1.
With Megumi Morisato at the controls...
I have built a perfect robot!
I wonder if you can defeat my creation?
I am impressed that you have built a robot like that by yourself.
But I know that victory will be mine!
My Hysteric Wheel 1 was designed to...
I know she is my sister, but that is terrifying.
And you two are so alike it is terrifying!
How can you be so relaxed?
Do not you remember the last time?
It is true your robot has overwhelming power, but it is not maneuverable enough!
Megumi Morisato is on a tear, collecting those cans!
Can she hang on for the win?
Okay, I am just going to cruise to victory!
Take a closer look at the rules!
Those are my kind of rules!
Your robot does not have any offensive functions.
Just let me reduce you to scrap!
What happens in a case like this?
Since she gobbled up Skuld's robot, I would have to say that means Megumi wins.
There is nothing for you to latch onto inside that drum... you cannot destroy it!
No way, no way, no way!
A self-destruct device, for crying out loud...
It will be a lot of work, cleaning up this mess.
I do not believe those two...
We are going to win next time, all right?
I want you to let me help, too.
Now, I want you to make up with Megumi.
Next time, let us build one together.
I bet it will be a lot more fun that way.
My robot was way more awesome than yours!
To think that is my own sister...
To think that is my own sister...
Just how is she like me?
You would better say we are not alike right now!
Always believe in yourself and your Dreams.
Always believe in yourself and your Dreams.
I love you so much it hurts...
And it hurts me that I cannot tell you how I feel.
You and I have matching hearts...
So we must share the same scars deep down inside.
But now that I am in your arms, I think I can catch...
All we have to do is gaze at each other.
It is all right for your heart to flutter...
All we have to do is love each other.
Open your heart, and ride that favorable wind.
Do not run away from happiness.
I will always be waiting for you.
So come rest your wings anytime.
It is all right to cry... anytime you need to.
I just want to see you again...
All we have to do is love each other.
Open your heart, and ride that favorable wind.
I just want you to be happy.
That which has been created... it is called a'Machine.'
A machine without a heart gains a soul thanks to the goddess' love.
When the Goddess Steals Your Heart Away
How much is this thing's electric bill going to cost me every month?
